message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.SY, cs.DS, cs.NE 

This paper deals with off-policy learning in Markov decision processes using gradient-based temporal difference algorithms with linear function approximation. This topic falls under the broad area of machine learning and reinforcement learning, which is covered by several sub-categories in arXiv CS. Specifically, cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) are the most likely categories as they cover a wide range of topics related to machine learning and reinforcement learning. The paper also deals with control systems (cs.SY), data structures and algorithms (cs.DS), and neural networks (cs.NE), which are all relevant sub-categories for this paper.
